metadata.title: CVE-2018-7871 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the getName function ofutil/decompile.c in libming 0.4.8 for CONSTANT16 data. A crafted input willlead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
